content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a command to browse the website "https://www.alllanguageresources.com/" for language learning resources and to list files in the directory "/home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/" using the "ls" command. My computer executed the command and returned a list of files in the directory, including various text files related to language learning, travel, and other topics, as well as image files and Python scripts. \n\nAs the user, I requested to read the file "language_resources.txt", which returned a list of language learning resources. I also requested to browse the website "https://www.atlasobscura.com/" for unique destinations and interesting stories, which returned a list of links and information about upcoming trips, courses, and hidden wonders around the world. However, my attempt to retrieve hyperlinks from the website failed due to too much output. \n\nI then requested my computer to google "information about love", which returned a list of links related to love and information. I also attempted to read the file "love_quotes.txt", but received an error message that the file did not exist. \n\nNext, I requested my computer to google "language learning resources" and browse the website "https://www.alllanguageresources.com/" for language learning resources. The website provided reviews and recommendations for various language learning resources, including online courses, apps, podcasts, and exchange programs, for a wide range of languages. \n\nFinally, I executed the command "ls" to list files in the directory "/home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/" and requested my computer to create a new file named "love_quotes.txt".'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb''\nSTDERR:\nb''"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "love quotes"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command google returned: ["https://www.goodhousekeeping.com/life/relationships/g3721/quotes-about-love/", "https://www.goodreads.com/quotes/tag/love", "https://www.shutterfly.com/ideas/i-love-you-quotes/", "https://www.brainyquote.com/topics/love-quotes", "https://parade.com/936221/marynliles/romantic-love-quotes/", "https://www.rd.com/article/love-quotes/", "https://www.womansday.com/relationships/a38346873/quotes-about-love/", "https://www.prevention.com/life/a42827694/self-love-quotes/"]'}]
"""
